title: Kill the Star Tribune
author: VD
content_html:
In which all Minnesota residents are cordially invited to enumerate their reasons for why the Star Tribune should not be saved. These can be posted in the comments there or emailed to me; ideally I’d like to post a new one every day. There’s really a whole host of reasons, but let’s face it, at the end of the day, this is the news organization that voluntarily inflicted Nick Coleman’s column on Minnesotans for years.

Bankruptcy is too kind a fate.

Minnesota bloggers who would like to be listed on the Kill the Strib blogroll should send me the name and URL of their blog. And don’t forget to vote!
